bibl.bibl: Owen, Richard. 1839a. Description of an extinct species of serpent found at Sheppey. Proceedings of the Geological Society of London 3 (1838–42): 165–6. Reprinted as Description of some Ophidiolites (Palæophis toliapicus) from the London Clay at Sheppey, indicative of an extinct species of serpent in Transactions of the Geological Society of London 2d ser. 6 (1842): 209–10.
